testcase.name: Actions .type() - type into a DOM element
Actions .focus() - focus on a DOM element
Actions .blur() - blur off a DOM element
Actions .clear() - clears an input or textarea element
testcase.classname: .clear() - clears an input or textarea element

testcase.name: Actions .click() - click on a DOM element
Actions .dblclick() - double click on a DOM element
testcase.classname: .dblclick() - double click on a DOM element

testcase.name: Actions .rightclick() - right click on a DOM element
testcase.classname: .rightclick() - right click on a DOM element

testcase.name: Actions .check() - check a checkbox or radio element
testcase.classname: .check() - check a checkbox or radio element

testcase.name: Actions .select() - select an option in a <select> element
testcase.classname: .select() - select an option in a <select> element

testcase.name: Actions .scrollIntoView() - scroll an element into view
Actions .trigger() - trigger an event on a DOM element
testcase.classname: .trigger() - trigger an event on a DOM element

testcase.name: Actions cy.scrollTo() - scroll the window or element to a position
testcase.classname: cy.scrollTo() - scroll the window or element to a position
